title: Scheduler Framework TCPN JSON input specification schema
description: Input for Scheduler Framework TCPN v2.0

simulate_thermal.description: True if want to simulate the thermal model

cores_specification.title: Group of cores with the same characteristics specification schema
cores_specification.description: Group of cores with the same characteristics specification

energy_consumption_properties.title: Core construction properties relatives to the energy consumption
energy_consumption_properties.description: Core construction properties relatives to the energy consumption

leakage_delta.description: Static power = current temperature * 2 * leakage_delta + leakage_alpha

leakage_alpha.description: Static power = current temperature * 2 * leakage_delta + leakage_alpha

simulation_specification.title: Specification of some parameters of the simulation
simulation_specification.description: Specification of some parameters of the simulation

dt.description: Minimum time unit simulated by the framework

mesh_step.description: Minimum physical size unit simulated by the framework

task_consumption_model.description: Task energy consumption model to use

worst_case_execution_time.description: Task worst case execution time in cycles
Task worst case execution time in cycles

arrive.description: Task arrive time, must be lower or equal than the hyperperiod

deadline.description: Task deadline time, must be lower or equal than the hyperperiod
